itemlayout.condition: Container.Content(movies) | Container.Content(sets) | Container.Content(tvshows) | Container.Content(seasons) | Container.Content(episodes) | Container.Content(musicvideos) | Window.IsActive(MyPVRRecordings.xml)

focusedlayout.condition: Container.Content(movies) | Container.Content(sets) | Container.Content(tvshows) | Container.Content(seasons) | Container.Content(episodes) | Container.Content(musicvideos) | Window.IsActive(MyPVRRecordings.xml)

itemlayout.condition: [Container.Content(artists) | Container.Content(albums) | Container.Content(addons) | Window.IsActive(MyPVRChannels.xml) | Window.IsActive(MyPVRTimers.xml) | Window.IsActive(MyPVRSearch.xml) | Container.Content(directors) | Container.Content(actors)] + !String.Contains(Container.FolderPath,musicvideos/artists)

focusedlayout.condition: [Container.Content(artists) | Container.Content(albums) | Container.Content(addons) | Window.IsActive(MyPVRChannels.xml) | Window.IsActive(MyPVRTimers.xml) | Window.IsActive(MyPVRSearch.xml) | Container.Content(directors) | Container.Content(actors)] + !String.Contains(Container.FolderPath,musicvideos/artists)

control.visible: Container.Content(movies) | Container.Content(sets) | Container.Content(actors) | Container.Content(directors) | Container.Content(tvshows) | Container.Content(seasons) | Container.Content(episodes)

![Container.Content(movies) | Container.Content(sets) | Container.Content(actors) | Container.Content(directors) | Container.Content(tvshows) | Container.Content(seasons) | Container.Content(episodes) | Window.IsActive(MyPVRChannels.xml) | Window.IsActive(MyPVRRecordings.xml) | Window.IsActive(MyPVRTimers.xml) | Window.IsActive(MyPVRSearch.xml)]

!Skin.HasSetting(ViewsHideFloor) + [Control.IsVisible(50) | Control.IsVisible(500) | Control.IsVisible(53) | Control.IsVisible(503) | Control.IsVisible(54) | Control.IsVisible(504) | Control.IsVisible(56) | Control.IsVisible(506) | Control.IsVisible(57) | Control.IsVisible(507)]

value.condition: !String.IsEmpty(Window(home).Property(SkinHelper.ListItem.Art.AnimatedPoster)) + Skin.HasSetting(SkinHelperAnimations) + [Control.Isvisible(50) | Control.Isvisible(501) | Control.Isvisible(510) | Control.Isvisible(511) | Control.Isvisible(700)| Control.Isvisible(514) | Control.Isvisible(516)]
